Staff is aware and practice of 10 General principles of routine care as per guideline
checkpoint.meansOfVerification: (1) Treat /Prevent Hypoglycaemia (2) treat and prevent Hypothermia (3) treat and prevent dehydration (4) Correct electrolyte imbalance (5) treat/ prevent infection (6) Correct micro nutrient deficiency (7) Start cautious diet (8) Achieve catch up growth (9) Provide sensory stimulation and emotional support (10) Prepare follow up after recovery
